price: We sent him[34] to one hundred thousand people or more,
arabic: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِاْئَةِ أَلۡفٍ أَوۡ يَزِيدُونَ
footnotes: [34] i.e., We sent him thereafter to his people.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-arsalnāhu ilā mi-ati alfin aw yazīdūna
